name: Solar Storm
description:
Solar Storm is a turn-based Scifi Artillery game with lots of Explosions and Unique Weapons.

Play casually with your friends in Procedural and fully Destructible Arenas to see who is the best! Supports up to 32 players. Ideal as a party game!


There are tons of Weapons, Powerups and Weapon Modes.


Bounce!

With Bounce Projectiles you can get some incredible trick shots!

Drill!

Oh, you're stuck under the ground? The enemy is behind a wall? Sounds like you need a Drill Projectile!




The Battles take place in fully destructible and random maps.

Each has unique properties, some might be very windy and have fast-rising water, while others commonly have Earthquakes and Meteorite Storms.

Fully Destructible Terrain!

Many weapons can cause explosions that destroy parts of the terrain. With a good aim, you can eliminate an enemy by strategically destroying the ground under them, sending them to the water below!

Disasters can be surprisingly deadly!
